name: gluttony

effect.sun_moon: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.

short_effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
